item.title: 澳大利亚柯林斯食品公司将退出塔可钟业务
item.description: 澳大利亚快餐连锁运营商柯林斯食品公司（Collins Foods）周二表示，计划在一年内退出塔可钟（Taco Bell）业务。【原文：Australian fast-food chain operator Collins Foods said on Tuesday it planned to exit its Taco Bell business within a year.】

item.title: T.消息人士称，T Rowe Price 投资管理公司将在欧特克代理权争夺战中支持 Starboard 公司
item.description: T.一位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，欧特克最大的投资者之一罗威普莱斯投资管理公司（T Rowe Price Investment Management）计划在这家软件设计公司的董事会挑战中投票支持激进投资者Starboard Value提名的董事人选。【原文：T. Rowe Price Investment Management, one of Autodesk's biggest investors, plans to vote for activist investor Starboard Value's director nominees in a boardroom challenge at the software-design company, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 面对特朗普的关税攻势，英国购物者在 3 月份提高了消费水平
item.description: 周二公布的数据显示，尽管在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）加征关税之前对全球经济的担忧与日俱增，但英国购物者上个月的支出仍有所增加。【原文：British shoppers spent more last month even as worries about the global economy grew in the run-up to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff increases, according to data published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国关税不确定，韩国推出 230 亿美元芯片支持计划
item.description: 韩国周二宣布，将对该国重要半导体产业的支持方案增加到 33 万亿韩元（232.5 亿美元），比去年公布的 26 万亿韩元方案增加了约四分之一。【原文：South Korea announced on Tuesday an increase in its support package for the country's vital semiconductor industry to 33 trillion won ($23.25 billion), up about a quarter from a 26 trillion won package unveiled last year.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局称正在调查达美航空公司航班上报告的发动机问题
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局表示，在达美航空机组人员报告周一一架波音 737-900 型飞机的发动机出现问题后，该局正在进行调查。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said it is investigating after a Delta airline crew reported an engine issue on a Boeing 737-900 flight on Monday.】

item.title: 赫兹称黑客窃取了其客户数据
item.description: 租车公司赫兹全球（Hertz Global）周一表示，其用户的部分数据在一次涉及其一家供应商的外泄事件中被盗。【原文：Rental car firm Hertz Global said on Monday some of its users' data was stolen in a breach involving one of its vendors.】

item.title: 客户推迟续签数据中心租约，应用数字公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 应用数字公司周一公布的第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是客户推迟续签数据中心租约，导致该公司股价在盘后交易中下跌 11%。【原文：Applied Digital reported third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Monday, as clients delayed renewing their data center leases, sending shares of the company down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 摩洛哥 HPS 公司首席执行官表示，计划在 2027 年前收购金融科技公司
item.description: 摩洛哥支付解决方案公司 HPS 首席执行官周一表示，该公司计划在 2027 年前收购一家金融科技公司，以刺激业务增长。【原文：Moroccan payment solutions firm HPS plans to spur growth with the acquisition of a fintech firm before 2027, the company's CEO said on Monday.】

item.title: 法官命令美国银行在 FDIC 诉讼案中支付 5.4 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）指控美国银行向联邦存款保险基金少缴摊款，联邦法官下令美国银行在这起旷日持久的诉讼中支付 5.403 亿美元。【原文：A federal judge ordered Bank of America to pay $540.3 million in a long-running lawsuit by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp, which accused the bank of underpaying assessments to a federal deposit insurance fund.】

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙出售价值约 3150 万美元的摩根大通股票
item.description: 据一份监管文件显示，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）已出售了价值约 3150 万美元的该银行股票。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co CEO Jamie Dimon has sold about $31.5 million worth of the bank's shares, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈克不评论经济和货币政策前景
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）在周一的演讲稿中没有对经济和货币政策发表评论。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker did not comment on the economy and monetary policy in a speech text on Monday.】

item.title: JBS 确定美国上市投票和纽约股票交易的暂定日期
item.description: 根据提交给美国市场监管机构的一份监管文件，全球最大的肉类包装公司 JBS SA 似乎已向获得在纽约证券交易所首次上市所需的批准迈进了一步。【原文：JBS SA, the world's largest meat-packer, appears to have moved a step closer to obtaining the necessary approvals for a primary listing of shares on the New York Stock Exchange, according to a regulatory document filed with the U.S. market regulator.】

item.title: 美国称从墨西哥进口的大部分西红柿将从 7 月 14 日起面临 21% 的关税
item.description: 美国商务部周一表示，从 7 月 14 日起，从墨西哥进口到美国的大部分番茄将面临 20.91% 的关税，因为美国退出了一项它认为未能保护国内番茄种植者的协议。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department on Monday said most tomatoes imported from Mexico to the United States will face duties of 20.91% from July 14 as it withdraws from an agreement it said had failed to protect domestic tomato growers.】

item.title: 交易日：关税减免，但有多短暂？
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 安森美搁置 69 亿美元收购 Allegro MicroSystems 的要约
item.description: 美国芯片制造商 Onsemi 周一表示，它将撤回对 Allegro MicroSystems 提出的 69 亿美元收购要约，一个月前，这家半导体解决方案供应商拒绝了更大竞争对手的最新收购要约。【原文：U.S chipmaker Onsemi said on Monday it was withdrawing its $6.9 billion offer for Allegro MicroSystems , a month after the semiconductor solutions provider rebuffed the latest offer from its larger rival.】

item.title: ADM 停止中国国内贸易，并在上海裁员
item.description: 全球谷物贸易商阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰（Archer-Daniels-Midland）周一在一份电子邮件声明中说，作为全球成本削减行动的一部分，该公司已开始关闭在中国的国内贸易业务，并在其最大的业务部门裁员。【原文：Global grain merchant Archer-Daniels-Midland has begun shutting down domestic trading operations in China and laying off staff within its largest business segment as part of a global cost-cutting push, the company said in an emailed statement on Monday.】

item.title: 美国对药品和半导体进口启动 232 条款调查
item.description: 根据周一在《联邦公报》上发布的通知，美国商务部长已启动对进口药品和半导体的232条款国家安全调查。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Secretary has initiated Section 232 national security investigations into imports of pharmaceuticals and semiconductors, according to notices posted to the Federal Register on Monday.】

item.title: 联合国贸易机构敦促美国将贫穷国家排除在关税之外
item.description: 联合国贸易与发展署周一敦促美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府将最贫穷和最小的经济体排除在互惠关税之外，因为这 "对美国贸易政策目标的影响微乎其微"。【原文：The U.N. Trade and Development agency urged U.S. President Donald Trump's administration on Monday to exclude the poorest and smallest economies from reciprocal tariffs because it "would have minimal impact on United States trade policy objectives."】

item.title: 家装零售商劳氏公司将以 13.3 亿美元收购 Artisan Design 公司
item.description: 美国家居装饰零售商劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos）周一表示，已同意以 13.3 亿美元的价格收购 Artisan Design Group。【原文：U.S. home improvement retailer Lowe's Cos said on Monday it has agreed to buy Artisan Design Group for $1.33 billion.】

item.title: 礼来公司在印度推出的 Mounjaro 引发减肥咨询热潮
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，礼来公司在印度推出的流行减肥药Mounjaro引发了患者对该药供应情况的大量咨询，一些印度医生接到了数百个有关该药的电话。【原文：The India launch of Eli Lilly's popular weight-loss drug Mounjaro has triggered a huge wave of patient enquiries about its availability, with some Indian doctors fielding hundreds of calls about the medicine, according to a Reuters survey.】

item.title: 关税暂停后贝莱德上调美股展望
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）周一表示，在美国宣布暂停实施大部分关税 90 天后，该研究所对美股的看涨立场略有上升。【原文：The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Monday that it is taking a modestly more bullish stance on U.S. stocks following the announcement of a 90-day pause in implementing most U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，Atlas 控股公司以每股 130 便士的价格竞购英国央行货币印刷商 De La Rue
item.description: 据天空新闻周一报道，总部位于美国的收购公司 Atlas Holdings 正在就以每股约 130 便士的价格收购纸币印刷商 De La Rue 进行深入谈判。【原文：U.S.-based buyout firm Atlas Holdings is in advanced talks to take over Banknote printer De La Rue for about 130 pence per share, Sky News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人寻求与美国共同努力达成公平关税协议
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周一表示，欧盟正在寻求与美国达成一项公平的关税协议，并补充说这需要双方 "共同努力"。【原文：The European Union is seeking a fair deal on tariffs with the United States, European Trade Commissioner Maros Sefcovic said on Monday, adding that this would require a "significant joint effort" on both sides.】

item.title: 市场崩溃后，Systematica 基金下跌 19
item.description: Systematica Investments 旗舰对冲基金的上市版本今年下跌了约 19%，原因是一些趋势跟踪策略在美国新贸易政策引发的市场动荡中举步维艰。【原文：A listed version of Systematica Investments' flagship hedge fund is down roughly 19% this year, as some trend-following strategies have struggled to navigate the market turmoil caused by the new U.S. trade policies.】

item.title: 摩根大通因需求疲软、产量增加下调油价预期
item.description: 摩根大通周一下调了 2025 年和明年的油价预期，理由是欧佩克+产量增加和需求疲软。【原文：JP Morgan on Monday lowered its oil price forecasts for 2025 and next year, citing higher production from OPEC+ and weaker demand.】

item.title: 分析师称，标普 500 指数迫在眉睫的 "死亡交叉 "可能并不像听起来那么不祥
item.description: 关税引发的美国股市大跌还面临另一个隐忧--"死亡交叉 "形态，但历史表明，这种听起来不吉利的技术信号并不一定意味着股市将面临更大幅度的下跌。【原文：A tariff-induced selloff in the U.S. stock market faces another worry, the "death cross" pattern, but history shows the ominous sounding technical signal may not necessarily mean equities face more significant downside.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出新的 GPT-4.1 模型，改进了编码和长语境理解能力
item.description: OpenAI 周一发布了新的人工智能模型 GPT-4.1，以及更小的版本 GPT-4.1 mini 和 GPT-4.1 nano，宣称在编码、指令遵循和长语境理解方面有重大改进。【原文：OpenAI on Monday launched its new AI model GPT-4.1, along with smaller versions GPT-4.1 mini and GPT-4.1 nano, touting major improvements in coding, instruction following, and long context comprehension.】

item.title: 三藩市联储文件称，求职率下降、失业时间增加可能预示着经济衰退即将到来
item.description: 据旧金山联邦储备银行周一发表的研究报告称，近年来美国失业率逐步且相对较小幅度上升的背后，是几个关注度较低的劳动力市场指标闪烁着经济衰退风险的黄灯。【原文：Behind the gradual and relatively small rise in the U.S. unemployment rate in recent years are a couple of less-closely followed labor market indicators that are flashing yellow for recession risk, according to research published on Monday by the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco.】

item.title: 尽管货币升值，阿根廷农民仍注重收获而非销售
item.description: 专家说，阿根廷谷物行业周一对汇率改革表示欢迎，但由于收成仍落后于计划，新措施可能不会立即转化为销售。【原文：Argentina's grain industry welcomed an exchange-rate overhaul on Monday, though the new measures will likely not translate into immediate sales as the harvest remains behind schedule, experts said.】

item.title: Meta 将在欧盟使用公共帖子和人工智能互动来训练模型
item.description: Meta Platforms 周一表示，它将利用用户与其人工智能的互动，以及成年人在其平台上分享的公开帖子和评论，在欧盟训练其人工智能模型。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Monday it would use interactions that users have with its AI, as well as public posts and comments shared by adults across its platforms, to train its artificial intelligence models in the European Union.】
